[[Hidan]] slashes the opponent with his [[Triple-Bladed Scythe]], creating an opening for [[Kakuzu]], who [[Earth Grudge Fear|grabs]] them and throws them at the ground. [[Zetsu]] [[Mayfly|emerges]] from the ground with his flytrap extensions "chewing" the opponent as he spins upwards. [[Deidara]] and [[Sasori]] attack from a distance with [[C1]] birds and a [[flamethrower]], causing an explosion. [[Orochimaru]] [[Wind Release: Great Breakthrough|shapes]] the explosion into a fiery whirlwind, which [[Itachi]] further incinerates with [[Amaterasu]]. After it explodes, [[Kisame]] slashes the opponent through the remains of the explosion with [[Samehada]], clearing the path for [[Konan]], who flies above and pins them with numerous paper spears. At the end, [[Pain]] finishes with [[Shinra Tensei]].
